top.title: Huge anti-government protests in Tehran and other Iranian cities, videos show
top.summary: Rallies on major roads in the capital and in Iran's second city were peaceful and not dispersed by security forces.

top.title: Owner of Swiss ski bar held in custody after deadly New Year's Eve fire
top.summary: Jacques Moretti is being held as a potential flight risk, Swiss media reports say.

top.title: US seizes fifth oil tanker linked to Venezuela, officials say
top.summary: The tanker, the Olina, is on multiple countries' sanctions list and is "suspected of carrying embargoed oil", US officials say.

top.title: Decide on X ban within days, government tells regulator
top.summary: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

top.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health to review your medical records
top.summary: The firm says its chatbot sees health and wellbeing questions from 230 million people every week.

top.title: Government accused of dragging its heels on deepfake law over Grok AI
top.summary: The End Violence Against Women Coalition said it had been a year since the inital law was suggested

title.#text: Black Mirror has been renewed for another season
